channel.title: Posts on PhD's, Blogs and Dogs 🐶
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on PhD's, Blogs and Dogs 🐶

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello World! Thought it would be good to start things off with a little blog post all about me 👋🏼 If you’ve already read ‘about me’, you’ll know I’m currently a Ph.D candidate. If not, then I’m currently a Ph.D candidate. I’m hoping this site will serve both as a deposit for my experiences and projects of interest as well as a trash bin for all my Ph.D thoughts and jargon.
